Deprecated API

Contents

  • Methods
  • Constructors
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.dao.DaoConfig.setHardSearchLimit​(int)
    This method does not do anything. Configure the page size on your paging provider instead. Deprecated in HAPI FHIR 2.3 (Jan 2017)
    ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.dao.DaoConfig.setIncludeLimit​(int)
    Deprecated in HAPI FHIR 3.2.0 as this method doesn't actually do anything
    ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.dao.DaoConfig.setSubscriptionEnabled​(boolean)
    As of HAPI FHIR 3.0.0, subscriptions no longer use polling for detecting changes, so this setting has no effect
    ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.dao.DaoConfig.setSubscriptionPollDelay​(long)
    As of HAPI FHIR 3.0.0, subscriptions no longer use polling for detecting changes, so this setting has no effect
    ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.dao.DaoConfig.setSubscriptionPurgeInactiveAfterMillis​(Long)
    As of HAPI FHIR 3.0.0, subscriptions no longer use polling for detecting changes, so this setting has no effect
    ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.dao.DaoRegistry.getResourceDaoIfExists​(Class<T>)
  • Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ca.uhn.fhir.jpa.search.DatabaseBackedPagingProvider​(int)
    Use DatabaseBackedPagingProvider as this constructor has no purpose
